title: Sound Type Recognition App
description: This app gets an audio as input and then detects and displays the type of sound and a brief definition of the sound it has detected.This app can be proposed as a solution for problems related to Surveillance systems, Disability assistance & Natural sounds recognition.This is a project that I have contributed in order to complete an assestment in the subject 'Mobile Application Development'with three of my university collegues.

title: Content Writing
description: This is my work on content writing.I am a content writer in the ICTSA and also at SD Music Records.So far I have contributed to develop contents for websites,song descriptions,personal descriptions and for video descriptions.Apart from that I have done some Assignment Writings as well.In the below link you will able to see my writings.

title: Single
description: This is a song that I have written and also sung by me.Mathaken is the very first song to be released from the new music album 'Shades of Love by' Wolfer.The song was written by Pavithra Dhananjani with the impact of real life experiences about the pain of separation and how life starts to move on.Wolfer (Sasindu Diluranga) marks his EDM identity in this song along with the voice of Pavithra Dhananjani.The song was recorded at SD Music Studio and  released officially under Mrec Entertainments.It is available on all streaming platforms.

title: Single
description: This is a song that I have written and also sung by me.The song demonstrates about the cosequences on nature by human.It is available on all streaming platforms.
